revision.text:
{{codepointer|r=Hexen}} '''A_CorpseBloodDrip'''
(''no parameter'')
Has a 50% chance of spawning {{Class|CorpseBloodDrip}} at the middle of the calling actor. This codepointer is restricted to {{Class|ZCorpseLynchedNoHeart}} and derived classes.
